0.text: The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go.
0.author: Dr. Seuss

1.text: Of course it is happening inside your head, Harry, but why on earth should that mean that it is not real?
1.author: J.K. Rowling

2.text: The truth is, everyone is going to hurt you. You just got to find the ones worth suffering for.
2.author: Bob Marley

3.text: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
3.author: Mother Teresa

4.text: To the well-organized mind, death is but the next great adventure.
4.author: J.K. Rowling

5.text: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
5.author: Charles M. Schulz

6.text: We read to know we're not alone.
6.author: William Nicholson

7.text: Any fool can know. The point is to understand.
7.author: Albert Einstein

8.text: I have always imagined that Paradise will be a kind of library.
8.author: Jorge Luis Borges

9.text: It is never too late to be what you might have been.
9.author: George Eliot
